org.openimaj.video.processing.shotdetector

Interface ShotDetectedListener<T extends Image<?,T>>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of Image

    public interface ShotDetectedListener<T extends Image<?,T>>
    Interface for objects that wish to listen to shot detections from the shot detector.
    Author:
    David Dupplaw (dpd@ecs.soton.ac.uk)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void differentialCalculated(VideoTimecode vt, double d, T frame)
      Called every time a differential between two frames has been calculated.
      void shotDetected(ShotBoundary<T> sb, VideoKeyframe<T> vk)
      Called when a shot is detected by the shot detector with the shot boundary definition and an associated key frame.

    • Method Detail

      • shotDetected

        void shotDetected(ShotBoundary<T> sb,
                VideoKeyframe<T> vk)
        Called when a shot is detected by the shot detector with the shot boundary definition and an associated key frame.
        Parameters:
        sb - The shot boundary definition
        vk - The keyframe

      • differentialCalculated

        void differentialCalculated(VideoTimecode vt,
                          double d,
                          T frame)
        Called every time a differential between two frames has been calculated.
        Parameters:
        vt - The timecode of the differential frame.
        d - The differential value
        frame - The current frame
